reviews.review:
Acheté en solde pour 0,81€ (WOOOOW trop de richesse, un véritable roi du pétrol), j'ai été ébloui par ce jeu ! Pas extrêmement difficile si l'on possède un QI supérieur à 90, il oblige quand même à une certaine réflexion, et est très agréable à joué, le tout au sein d'une ambiance oppressante mais avec ses pointes d'humour.
Si vous cherchez un petit jeu sympa pour vous détendre quelques heures, et bien meilleur que des blockbusters AAA à 60 balles qui sortent aujourd'hui, Portal est ce qu'il vous faut !
This game is really cool! I remember playing the demo in the XBOX 360 and when i came to pc i bought it with HL2. I love it too bad it's short.

Uno de los mejores plataformas, su historia, su forma de comunicar hizo escuela en la industria, literalmente si te gustan los vídeojuegos tienes que jugarlo si o si, además han pasado bastante años y gráficamente se sigue viendo bien, ojalá Valve siguiera haciendo juegos de esta calidad

Qué decir cuando todo se ha dicho. No diré cosas como "eres una ***** si no lo has jugado" o algo por el estilo. 
Como todo lo de Valve (sin ser chupamedias) es una genialidad. Lo había pasado hace bastantes años pero hace poco lo compré por steam porque me parece una joya, además que siempre está en oferta y es mucho más que accesible. 
Si no lo tenes antes de comprarte el juego solo te recomiedo el Valve complete pack o más barato The Orange box, por una pequeña diferencia tendrás varios de Valve. 
Ahora, el juego: Muy bueno, buena idea, buenos puzzles y muy entretenido. Si se presta atención a los detalles de las zonas se pueden encontrar diversas frases y refencias.
No es muy largo, tiene la duración justa; no llega al punto de cansarte de saltar entre portal y portal. 
Muy pero muy recomendado y mucho más el Portal 2.

One of THE MOST enjoyable games out there...
And since it uses the same engine as Half life 2, you can mess around with some of the console commands and go all RAMBO
BEYİN YORUYO
是很优秀，创意很足，但是也是第一款让我玩了想吐的游戏，不是晕3D，只是风格，气氛接受不了。来一点BGM，轻松幽默一点也许会好很多。
Très bon jeu mais le 2 est largement supérieur

เกม Portal เป็นเกมที่ดีแต่ เกมจบเร็วเกินไปขนาดพึ่งเริ่มหัดเล่น ยังใช้เวลาไปแค่ 6 ชม. ก็จบแล้ว ปริศนาก็แก้ง่ายเกินไป แต่รวมๆแล้วดี แนะนำว่าให้ซื้อตอนลดราคา เพราะถ้าซื้อราคาเต็มมันจะเสียดายเงินกับการเล่นไปแค่ 6 ชม. พอเล่นจนจบแล้วก็ไม่มีเหตุผลที่จะกลับมาเล่นต่อ แต่รวมๆ แล้วดี ให้คะแนน 8.9/10 ขอให้คุณลองดู บทวิจารณ์ของคนอื่นๆดูด้วยนะครับอย่าตัดสินแค่ บทวิจารณ์ของผมอันเดียว

Trés bon jeu avec un gamplay simple qui repose sur 2 portails on se rend compte qu'il y a énormément de possibilités pour faire un jeu de plateform et d'égnime à la fois.
Une plutot comique à la quel on s'attache à force sur lors du générique de fin.
Peu etre fait en 1 ou 2 heure tranquillement pour se détendre.
En bonus des référence a Half Life caché dans les niveau que du bonheur pour les fans.

So, although I've been a fan of the game, seeing some others play it a little, I never actually got to play it myself until I bought the bundle on sale, like, right now! 

I just finished playing it and am waiting for Portal 2 to install, because this game is so much fun! 

In all honesty, I'm not thaaaaaat big of a fan of, like, puzzle games, generally, unless there's something more special to the story or mechanics. But, the atmosphere is so much fun, it's super interesting because essentially you ARE a test object and you just wonder all the time when something gonna go wrong, when "The cake is a lie" finally makes sense (is it a spoiler if the phrase is very well-known already since the game is so old?)

WARNING THOUGH !!! 
As fun as the game is, I'm one of those people who get motion sick fairly easily. I can't read or watch anything when sitting in a fast-driving car, driving longer than two hours in a car requires either a break to breathe in between or a lot of water, and watching my beloved found-footage movies in theatres made me throw up one time. When I play too much Mirror's Edge for a while, then I get sick, too. Boats are my nemesis.

Portal doesn't make you sick all that fast at all, I just got a little queasy towards the end, but I got up took a walk through my apartment, and got back to it. All fine, again. Still, be aware of that if you do get easily motion-sick like me and wanna play it. But it doesn't take away from the fun in the slightest!!
Fun puzzles, funny, but short. definitely worth a buy along with the second.

Portal gerçekten benim üstümde etki bırakabilen nadir oyunlardan biriydi.Gerçekten eğlenceli bir fikir çıkarmış Valve.Mükemmel denebilecek derecede tasarlanmış zekice bulmacalar.Sempatik karakterler.
Oyun eğlenceliydi ama yer yer sürükleyiciliğini kaybediyordu.Kafa yormaktan bıktığım sahneler oluyordu.Ayrıca yanımızda bir karakter olmamısı sürükleyiciliğinin tökezlemesini etkileyebilen büyük etkenlerden biriydi (Portal 2 de düzeltilmiş olması gerçekten iyi bir geliştirme) Gerçekten oyun güzeldi finali de tahmin edilmesi kolay bir finaldi,oyun eski olduğundan dolayı olabilir belki de.Final basit olsa da gerçekten etkileyiciydi ve boss savaşının içinde bazı bulmacalar olması gerçekten etkileyicilydi.Oyunu bitirdiğimde gerçekten tatmin olmuştum.

ARTILAR
Eğlenceli bir fikir,zekice tasarlanmış test odaları oyunun finalinin güzel olması,yer yer komik yerler ile oyunun karakterleri ve kendini sempatikleştirmesi.
Eksiler
Zaman zaman sürükleyiciliğini kaybetmesi ve oyuna günlük aralar verdirmesi.
Az önce oyunun soundtrack listi açıldı wtf

This was a triumph!
I'm making a note here:
Huge success!

It's hard to overstate
my satisfaction.

Aperture Science:
We do what we must
because we can
For the good of all of us.
Except the ones who are dead.

But there's no sense crying
over every mistake.
You just keep on trying
'til you run out of cake.
And the science gets done.
And you make a neat gun
for the people who are
still alive.

I'm not even angry...
I'm being so sincere right now.
Even though you broke my heart,
and killed me.

And tore me to pieces.
And threw every piece into a fire.
As they burned it hurt because
I was so happy for you!

Now, these points of data
make a beautiful line.
And we're out of beta.
We're releasing on time!
So I'm GLaD I got burned!
Think of all the things we learned!
for the people who are
still alive.

Go ahead and leave me...
I think I'd prefer to stay inside...
Maybe you'll find someone else
to help you.
Maybe Black Mesa?
That was a joke. Ha Ha. Fat Chance!

Anyway this cake is great!
It's so delicious and moist!

Look at me: still talking
when there's science to do!
When I look out there,
it makes me glad I'm not you.

I've experiments to run.
There is research to be done.
On the people who are
still alive.
And believe me I am
still alive.
I'm doing science and I'm
still alive.
I feel fantastic and I'm
still alive.
While you're dying I'll be
still alive.
And when you're dead I will be
still alive

Still alive.

Still alive.
